alert.note: Alert for Hand; Hyde (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Aberdeen (Northern and Northeastern South Dakota)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 24 at 12:50AM MDT until June 24 at 1:30AM MDT by NWS Aberdeen
info.description: The National Weather Service in Aberdeen has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Hand County in central South Dakota... Eastern Hyde County in central South Dakota... * Until 230 AM CDT. * At 150 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 7 miles north of Highmore to near Gann Valley, moving north at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Severe thunderstorms will be near... Pleasant Valley Country Church around 210 AM CDT. Other locations in the path of these severe thunderstorms include Sunshine Bible Academy, Rosehill Dam and Vayland. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
